name: The Last Scratcher
description:
"A long time ago, the world was filled with scratch developers. 

But then the C++ zombies came. 

All of the Scratchers were slaughtered. 

All but one."

- The Story

Play as the last scratcher alive, after the C++ zombies attacked. Defend yourself against the evil c++ zombies using only a silenced pistol and your wits...

Use WASD or arrow keys to move, and mouse to aim and shoot. Have fun!
